1. City Council

City Council
============

![Six people stand smiling in the Gun Barrel City Council Chambers, with the city logo and flags](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=884)

* The 4th Tuesday of the month unless otherwise noted
* Gun Barrel City Hall Council Chambers
  1716 W Main Street
  Gun Barrel City, TX 75156

Special Meetings will be posted 72 hours before meeting and may have different times. For dates, times and locations of upcoming City Council meetings, visit the City Calendar.

Individuals wishing to address the City Council on specific items, during public hearings of the City Council Meeting must fill out a
Request to Speak Form (DOC)
.

[Watch City Council meeting videos](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/306)
.

* [Brian Crull](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=18)
  , Mayor
* [April Burns](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=19)
  , Council Place 1 - Mayor Pro Tem
* [Rita Evans](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=20)
  , Council Place 2
* [Jennifer Jacobs](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=21)
  , Council Place 3
* [Brian Henson](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/directory.aspx?EID=22)
  , Council Place 4
* [Robert Edwards](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=23)
  , Council Place 5

The City of Gun Barrel City is governed by a Mayor and City Council. Day-to-day operations are managed by the City Manager, who is appointed by the City Council.

"Citizens, employees and appointed board members of Gun Barrel City have the opportunity to speak to the City Council in an open meeting. At times, statements may be made by those individuals that the City of Gun Barrel City does not agree with or condone. Any views or opinions made by any citizen, appointed board member, employee or official of Gun Barrel City toward any person or group based upon the person or group's race, color, gender or creed do not represent the views and opinions of Gun Barrel City and will not be tolerated."

* [City Employment](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/198/City-Employment)
